bill.summary:
Expresses support for the designation of a National Donate Life Month.
Expresses support and gratitude to all Americans who have communicated their intent to be organ and tissue donors upon their deaths.
Urges Americans who are not already donors to consider their organ, blood, and tissue donation options.
